TEXT.S: Sinvi i Chiayi a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Sinvi. u kasalumaluma' nu Sinvi sa, 128 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 375 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 350 ku tademaw, pakalatu 93%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 25 ku tademaw, pakalatu 7%. u kasabinacadan, Cou 89%, Bunun 3%, Tayal 1%, Amis 1%.
